      void setup()
      Runs before every test, creates the required MenuBar and (mocked) Player and PlayerInventory objects
      void testClearTimerMessageNotDispatchedInstantly()
      Tests MenuBar.clearTimer() ensures that the message that was to be passed when the timer runs out is not passed when the timer is cleared
      void testClearTimerMessageNotDispatchedWhenTimerRunsOut()
      Tests MenuBar.clearTimer() ensures that the message that was to be passed when the timer runs out is not passed when the timer would have run out after the timer has been cleared

      Tests MenuBar.clearTimer() ensures the timer is not displayed on screen once cleared

      Tests MenuBar.hideNextStageButton() ensures that the next stage button is hidden (if already shown) when the hideNextStageButton method is called
